p: Over 86 trap-days, 488 mosquitoes belonging to four genera, Aedes, Culex, Armigeres and Anopheles, were captured ( Table 1). The majority (40.8%) of mosquitoes collected inside houses belonged to the genus Aedes with 187 Ae. aegypti (130 females and 57 males) and 12 Ae. albopictus (11 females and one male).
